level.text: 2703.1 The District of Columbia Medicaid Program shall reimburse claimsubmitted by participating providers for the following prescriptions:
Legend drugs that are prescribed for their labeled use; and

Over-the-counter (OTC) medications as listed in the District Medicaid Preferredrug List and the Pharmacy Billing Manual. The following categories of OTCedications shall be covered when prescribed by a licensed provider:
Oral analgesics with a single active ingredient (such as, aspirin,
Ferrous salts (such as, sulfate and gluconate);
Antacids with up to three active ingredients (such as, aluminum,
Diabetic preparations (such as, insulin and syringes);
Pediatric, prenatal, and geriatric vitamin formulations;
Family planning drugs and supplies; and
Senna extract, single dose preparations when required for diagnosticadiological procedures performed under the supervision of a physician.
